details:
bnxt_en: fix memory leak in bnxt_nvm_test()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.6 by commit be083d97031712a2e16fd915ddb8fe1a6cb1fbc5, it was introduced in version v6.0 by commit 5b6ff128fdf60b08c67b9b50addadc8fb8da4410. For more details please see the references link.
